"Float-A-Palooza": A themed pool party that incorporates pool floats into games and activities, such as a pool float relay race or a float-building challenge.
"Pool Float Cinema": A movie night in the pool featuring a projector and screen on a float, complete with comfortable seating and snacks.
"Pool Float Yoga": A yoga class held in the pool on floats, providing a unique and relaxing experience for participants.
"Pool Float Karaoke": A karaoke competition held in the pool on floats, where participants can sing their hearts out while enjoying the water.
"Pool Float Art": A pool party where participants can create their own art on pool floats using various materials such as paint, markers, and glitter.
